author: Special Correspondent
text:
A total of 1,829 persons who possessed licensed weapons for their personal security have handed over the same to the police in connection with the forthcoming Assembly elections.

Police sources said that as per the election code, all those who possessed arms licence should hand over the same to the police.

Following the announcement of poll schedule, Sumit Sharan, Police Commissioner and G. Subbulakshmi, Superintendent of Police, directed the weapon holders to handover them at the police stations.

Following this, of the 550 people who possessed arms in the Salem city limits, 490 have already handed over the arms at the police station limits. Of the 1,440 weapon holders in the district police limits, all but one have handed over them.

Police has directed the rest of the people to handover the weapons at the earliest.
title: Licensed owners of arms surrender weapons
